Name: Sandstone
Description: A beautiful rock composed of multiple layers of sediment.

Name: Sink
Description: No collection is complete without it.

Name: Rubik's Cube
Description: This mystery of the universe has already been solved.

Name: Office Mug
Description: An intermediary place to store espresso before you move it to your mouth.

Name: Small Obelisk
Description:
A rectangular stone piece.

Its function is unclear.

Name: Old X-Ray
Description: Ew, weird. It has five fingers!

Name: Blender
Description: Equipment used to conduct experiments answering the age-old question, "Could that blend"?

Name: Moldavite
Description: A unique green stone formed from the impact of a meteorite.

Name: Archaic Tech
Description: Be kind when you handle it. It's very fragile.

Name: Mangled Saxophone
Description: The name "Pesquet" is barely legible on the inside.

Name: Modern Art
Description: I don't get it.

Name: Honey Jar
Description: Sweet golden liquid with just a touch of uranium.

Name: Wrist Watch
Description: It was discovered in a package labeled "To be entrusted to Dr. Walker".

Name: Encrusted Teapot
Description: A teapot from the depths of space, coated in a thick layer of Neutronium.

Name: Strange Brick
Description: It still works.

Name: Robot Arm
Description: It's not functional. Just cool.

Name: Shield Generator
Description: A mechanical prototype capable of producing a small section of shielding.

Name: Bioluminescent Rock
Description: A thriving colony of tiny, microscopic organisms is responsible for giving it its bluish glow.

Name: Grubgrub Statue
Description: A moving tribute to a tiny plant hugger.

Name: Stethoscope
Description: Listens to Duplicant heartbeats, or gurgly tummies.

Name: Egg-Shaped Rock
Description: It's unclear whether this is its naturally occurring shape, or if its appearance as been sculpted.

Name: Pristine Fossil
Description: The preserved bones of an early species of Hatch.

Name: Tornado Rock
Description: It's unclear how it formed, although I'm glad it did.

Name: Percolator
Description: Don't drink from it! There was a pacu... IN the percolator!

Name: Magma Lamp
Description: The sequel to "Lava Lamp".

Name: Useless Machine
Description: What does it do?

Name: Double Helix Model
Description: An educational model of genetic information.

Name: Egg-Shaped Rock
Description:
It's unclear whether this is its naturally occurring shape, or if its appearance as been sculpted.

This one is rainbow colored.

Name: Plasma Lamp
Description: No space colony is complete without one.

Name: Radiation Mood Ring
Description: How radioactive are you feeling?

Name: Self-Contained System
Description: A marvel of the cosmos, inside this display is an entirely self-contained solar system.

Name: Moonmoonmoon
Description: A moon's moon's moon. It's very small.

Name: Model Nuclear Power Plant
Description: It's pronounced nu-clear.
